* {{EntityLink|Long Nose Sheep|link=MCE:Long Nose Sheep}}, a tan sheep with a black face, legs and hooves
* {{EntityLink|White Sheep|link=MCE:White Sheep}}, a sheep from original Minecraft

* {{EntityLink|Wooloo|link=MCE:Wooloo}}
